verses.verse: Jude, <WG2455> a bond-servant of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> and brother <WG80> of James, <WG2385> to those <WG3588> who are the called, <WG2822> beloved <WG25> in God <WG2316> the Father, <WG3962> and kept <WG5083> for Jesus <WG2424> Christ: <WG5547>
May mercy <WG1656> and peace <WG1515> and love <WG26> be multiplied <WG4129> to you.

Beloved, <WG27> while I was making <WG4160> every <WG3956> effort <WG4710> to write <WG1125> you about <WG4012> our common <WG2839> salvation, <WG4991> I felt <WG2192> the necessity <WG318> to write <WG1125> to you appealing <WG3870> that you contend <WG1864> earnestly <WG1864> for the faith <WG4102> which was once <WG530> for all <WG530> delivered <WG3860> to the saints. <WG40>

For certain <WG5100> persons <WG444> have crept <WG3921> in unnoticed, <WG3921> those <WG3588> who were long <WG3819> beforehand <WG4270> marked <WG4270> out for this <WG3778> condemnation, <WG2917> ungodly <WG765> persons <WG765> who turn <WG3346> the grace <WG5485> of our God <WG2316> into licentiousness <WG766> and deny <WG720> our only <WG3441> Master <WG1203> and Lord, <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>

Now <WG1161> I desire <WG1014> to remind <WG5279> you, though you know <WG3609> all <WG3956> things <WG3956> once <WG530> for all, <WG530> that the Lord, <WG2962> after saving <WG4982> a people <WG2992> out of the land <WG1093> of Egypt, <WG125> subsequently <WG1208> destroyed <WG622> those <WG3588> who did not believe. <WG4100>

And angels <WG32> who did not keep <WG5083> their own <WG1438> domain, <WG746> but abandoned <WG620> their proper <WG2398> abode, <WG3613> He has kept <WG5083> in eternal <WG126> bonds <WG1199> under <WG5259> darkness <WG2217> for the judgment <WG2920> of the great <WG3173> day. <WG2250>

Just <WG5613> as Sodom <WG4670> and Gomorrah <WG1116> and the cities <WG4172> around <WG4012> them, since they in the same <WG3664> way <WG5158> as these <WG3778> indulged <WG1608> in gross <WG1608> immorality <WG1608> and went <WG565> after <WG3694> strange <WG2087> flesh, <WG4561> are exhibited <WG4295> as an example, <WG1164> in undergoing <WG5254> the punishment <WG1349> of eternal <WG166> fire. <WG4442>

Yet <WG3305> in the same <WG3668> manner <WG3668> these <WG3778> men, <WG3778> also <WG2532> by dreaming, <WG1797> defile <WG3392> the flesh, <WG4561> and reject <WG114> authority, <WG2963> and revile <WG987> angelic majesties. <WG1391>

But Michael <WG3413> the archangel, <WG743> when <WG3753> he disputed <WG1252> with the devil <WG1228> and argued <WG1256> about <WG4012> the body <WG4983> of Moses, <WG3475> did not dare <WG5111> pronounce <WG2018> against <WG2018> him a railing <WG988> judgment, <WG2920> but said, <WG3004> "The Lord <WG2962> rebuke <WG2008> you."

But these <WG3778> men <WG3778> revile <WG987> the things which <WG3745> they do not understand; <WG3609> and the things which <WG3745> they know <WG1987> by instinct, <WG5447> like <WG5613> unreasoning <WG249> animals, <WG2226> by these <WG3778> things <WG3778> they are destroyed. <WG5351>

Woe <WG3759> to them! For they have gone <WG4198> the way <WG3598> of Cain, <WG2535> and for pay <WG3408> they have rushed <WG7062> headlong <WG7062> into the error <WG4106> of Balaam, <WG903> and perished <WG622> in the rebellion <WG485> of Korah. <WG2879>

These <WG3778> men <WG3778> are those <WG3588> who are hidden <WG4694> reefs <WG4694> in your love <WG26> feasts <WG26> when they feast <WG4910> with you without <WG870> fear, <WG870> caring <WG4165> for themselves; <WG1438> clouds <WG3507> without <WG504> water, <WG504> carried <WG3911> along <WG3911> by winds; <WG417> autumn <WG5352> trees <WG1186> without <WG175> fruit, <WG175> doubly <WG1364> dead, <WG599> uprooted; <WG1610>

wild <WG66> waves <WG2949> of the sea, <WG2281> casting <WG1890> up their own <WG1438> shame <WG152> like <WG1890> foam; <WG1890> wandering <WG4107> stars, <WG792> for whom <WG3739> the black <WG2217> darkness <WG4655> has been reserved <WG5083> forever. <WG165>

And about these <WG3778> also <WG2532> Enoch, <WG1802> [in] the seventh <WG1442> [generation] from Adam, <WG76> prophesied, <WG4395> saying, <WG3004> "Behold, <WG2400> the Lord <WG2962> came <WG2064> with many <WG3461> thousands <WG3461> of His holy <WG40> ones, <WG40>

to execute <WG4160> judgment <WG2920> upon all, <WG3956> and to convict <WG1651> all <WG3956> the ungodly <WG765> of all <WG3956> their ungodly <WG763> deeds <WG2041> which <WG3739> they have done <WG764> in an ungodly <WG764> way, <WG764> and of all <WG3956> the harsh <WG4642> things <WG4642> which <WG3739> ungodly <WG763> sinners <WG268> have spoken <WG2980> against <WG2596> Him. "

These <WG3778> are grumblers, <WG1113> finding <WG3202> fault, <WG3202> following <WG4198> after <WG2596> their [own] lusts; <WG1939> they speak <WG2980> arrogantly, <WG5246> flattering <WG2296> people <WG4383> for the sake <WG5484> of [gaining an] advantage. <WG5622>
But you, beloved, <WG27> ought to remember <WG3403> the words <WG4487> that were spoken <WG4275> beforehand <WG4275> by the apostles <WG652> of our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547>
that they were saying <WG3004> to you, "In the last <WG2078> time <WG5550> there shall be mockers, <WG1703> following <WG4198> after <WG2596> their own <WG1438> ungodly <WG763> lusts. <WG1939>"
These <WG3778> are the ones who cause <WG592> divisions, <WG592> worldly-minded, devoid <WG3361> <WG2192> of the Spirit. <WG4151>
But you, beloved, <WG27> building <WG2026> yourselves <WG1438> up on your most <WG40> holy <WG40> faith; <WG4102> praying <WG4336> in the Holy <WG40> Spirit; <WG4151>

keep <WG5083> yourselves <WG1438> in the love <WG26> of God, <WG2316> waiting <WG4327> anxiously <WG4327> for the mercy <WG1656> of our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> to eternal <WG166> life. <WG2222>
And have <WG1653> mercy <WG1653> on some, <WG3739> <WG3303> who are doubting; <WG1252>

save <WG4982> others, snatching <WG726> them out of the fire; <WG4442> and on some <WG3739> have <WG1653> mercy <WG1653> with fear, <WG5401> hating <WG3404> even <WG2532> the garment <WG5509> polluted <WG4695> by the flesh. <WG4561>

Now <WG1161> to Him who is able <WG1410> to keep <WG5442> you from stumbling, <WG679> and to make <WG2476> you stand <WG2476> in the presence <WG2714> of His glory <WG1391> blameless <WG299> with great <WG20> joy, <WG20>

to the only <WG3441> God <WG2316> our Savior, <WG4990> through <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> our Lord, <WG2962> [be] glory, <WG1391> majesty, <WG3172> dominion <WG2904> and authority, <WG1849> before <WG4253> all <WG3956> time <WG165> and now <WG3568> and forever. <WG165> Amen. <WG281>
